title: Dead Elite
description: Emilie Roze gets tangled up in the dark side of luxury life. Becoming a young elitist is not easy when one of her friends is a sweet psycho. And life even gets worse when she almost falls in love with the handsome man who rapes her.The chaos happens when the taste of champagne turns bitter and fiery. The poison kills one of The Elite. Itâ€™s the social group established by the eight rich kids in Manhattan, including Emilie. But there is only one murderer. One lies. And all that it takes just one explosion to uncover the truth.
author: Keefe R.D.
